appConfigCodeComponentDescription: Code to incorporate Azure App Configuration services into the app
appConfigFunctionShowBetaFeatureDescript: A new HTTP-triggered function to demonstrate how to access feature flags in Azure App Configuration
appConfigFunctionShowMessageDescription: A new HTTP-triggered function to demonstrate how to access settings in Azure App Configuration
appConfigFunctionStartupDescription: Startup code to make Azure App Configuration services available through dependency injection
appConfigStartupCodeComponentDescription: Startup code to make Azure App Configuration services available through dependency injection
appInsightsConfigComponentDescription: Connection string will be updated in the config file
appServiceSettingsComponentDescription: Azure AppService settings will be modified to ensure optimal operation of the new dependency
appSettingsComponentDescription: Application settings will be modified to ensure optimal operation of the new dependency
codeComponentDescription: Code will be added to the project to enable new dependency
containerAppSettingsComponentDescription: Azure Container App settings will be modified to ensure optimal operation of the new dependency
customConnectorDescription: A custom connector will be created or updated in Microsoft Power Platform
dotnetMsIdentityDescription: Calls the dotnet msidentity command line tool to finish updating the remote app registration
identityCodeUpdateDescription: App settings will be configured and project code will be updated to connect to Microsoft identity platform
launchSettingsComponentDescription: launchSettings.json needs to be updated to ensure correct local runtime behavior
localAccessComponentDescription: The permissions on the instance will be modified to allow your local machine to connect to it
msbuildPropertyComponentDescription: Profile's *.pubxml file will be updated to ensure optimal operation of the new dependency
nugetComponentDescription: NuGet packages will be modified to ensure optimal operation of the new dependency
projectPropertyComponentDescription: Project properties will be updated to enable new dependency
remoteAccessComponentDescription: The permissions on the instance will be modified to allow your App Service to connect to it
containerAppRemoteAccessComponentDescrip: The permissions on the instance will be modified to allow your container app to connect to it
secretStoreComponentDescription: Application secrets used by the new dependency will be stored in the selected secrets store
serviceConnectorComponentDescription: Connection and network settings will be configured by Service Connector
itemTemplateCreatorComponentDescription: C# code file(s) will be created from item template
wapWebConfigComponentDescription: Web.config settings will be modified to ensure optimal operation of the new dependency
